source:
-- Tworzenie Widoków Delta w warstwie Silver
CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS silver;

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW silver_d_products AS
SELECT * FROM delta.`abfss://silver@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/d_products`;

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW silver_d_regions AS
SELECT * FROM delta.`abfss://silver@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/d_regions`;

-- Tworzenie tabel w warstwie Gold

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS gold.d_products
USING DELTA
LOCATION 'abfss://gold@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/d_products'
AS
SELECT * FROM silver_d_products
WHERE 1 = 0;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS gold.d_regions
USING DELTA
LOCATION 'abfss://gold@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/d_customers'
AS
SELECT * FROM silver_d_regions
WHERE 1 = 0;

-- Zmiana nazw kolumn w tabeli d_products i zapis do warstwy Gold
INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE gold.d_products
SELECT 
    product_id AS IdProduct,
    product_name AS Name,
    brand_name AS Brand,
    sub_brand_name AS SubBrand,
    category_name AS Category
FROM silver_d_products;

-- Usuwanie duplikatów w tabeli d_regions i zapis do nowej tabeli Gold
INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE gold.d_regions
SELECT DISTINCT 
    country_id AS IDCountry,
    cluster AS Claster,
    region_description AS Region,
    country AS Country
FROM silver_d_regions;
